kernel.managers
Class ConfigurationMenuManager

java.lang.Object
  kernel.managers.ConfigurationMenuManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class ConfigurationMenuManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

Class that handles the Configuration Menu Options It contains a list of colors and characteristics of the Diagram, so we can change colors of different characteristics of the Diagram, as, for example, axes, selected entities, labels, etc.

STILL IN DEVELOPMENT

Author:
Javier Molpeceres and Rodrigo Santamaría

ConfigurationMenuManager

public ConfigurationMenuManager(Diagram panel,
                                javax.swing.JInternalFrame configWindow,
                                java.awt.Color[] palette,
                                javax.swing.JTextField[] sample)
Builds a Configuration manager for DiagramWindows

Parameters:
panel - Diagram to which this Manager will be linked
configWindow - JInternalFrame that contains this configuration menu
palette - Color array with color for the Diagram
sample - JTextField array that serves as sample of the color chosen
